thread.title: great hotel
thread.title_full: great hotel - Review of Park Central Hotel New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: omhernandez
title: great hotel
text:
I took my daughter to new York as a 21st bday present. I selected this hotel very randomly. we were very pleased. the location is so super convenient to everything we did. I plan to visit new York once a year and plan to stay here every time.
also, the mattresses and pillows were the most comfortable of any hotel we have ever stayed at. so much so that I reached out to customer relations after we returned home to find out the exact type of mattress and pillows they sue.
